attributes.action: David Cameron to apologise publicly  for 'terrorist sympathisers' comment.
attributes.additional_details: For those who are in disbelief at this I urge you to watch footage of prime ministers questions 2nd December 2015.
attributes.background: I am against bombing in Syria as I have every right to be but our PM has no right to call anyone who is against his views on this a terrorist sympathiser.  He should publicly apologise for this grossly unfair, threatening and slanderous comment or be forced to step down immediately from office.
